title: Pixel og 128 gb touch flick and unresponsive
content:
Hi there, after July security update my pixel touch starts to be unresponsive and/or trigger the wrong gestures. 

Ex: by typing on keyboard I get notification center fully open. Really annoying

I've already performed a full erasing but the bug is still there (also in safe mode). How can I solve? Thanks
Fun fact: if you lock and unlock the phone glitches vanish and you have time to reply text
